  • Method Details

    • getAllTests

      @GetMapping public Collection<TestDto> getAllTests()
      Returns:
      Collection of TestDto models of all Tests in the repository

    • getAllUncompletedTests

      @GetMapping("/notcompleted") public Collection<TestDto> getAllUncompletedTests()
      Returns:
      Collection of TestDto models of all Tests in the repository, that have property "isCompleted" with value "false"

    • getTestById

      @GetMapping("/{id:\\d+}") public TestDto getTestById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - - ID of the Test
      Returns:
      TestDto model of the Test with param id

    • createNewTest

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TestDto> createNewTest(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid InputTestDto inputTestDto, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      inputTestDto - input InputTestDto model of the Test that has to be created
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      TestDto model of the created Test

    • editTestById

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public TestDto editTestById(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid UpdateTestDto updateTestDto, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      id - of the Test that will be updated
      updateTestDto - input DTO model of the Test with applied changes
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      TestDto model of the updated Test

    • completeTest

      @PutMapping("/{id}/complete") public TestDto completeTest(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid CompleteTestDto completeTestDto, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      id - - ID of the Test that will be completed
      completeTestDto - - input DTO model with changes that will be applied to the Test
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      TestDto model of the completed Test

    • deleteTestById

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public TestDto deleteTestById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - of the Test that will be deleted
      Returns:
      TestDto model of the Test that was deleted

    • getCountOfTests

      @GetMapping(value="/count", produces="text/plain") public String getCountOfTests()
      Returns:
      count of all Tests in the repository
